title: What are the best private medical colleges in north India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, you want to know what are the best private medical colleges in north India. Followings are the top private medical colleges in north India: Kasturba Medical College, ManipalChristian Medical College, LudhianaDayanand Medical College and Hospital, LudhianaHamdard Institute of Medical Sciences and Research, New DelhiHimalayan Institute of Medical Sciences, Dehradun These are the top private medical colleges in south India: Christian Medical College, VelloreSt Johns Medical College, BangaloreSri Ramachandra Medical College and Research Institute, ChennaiKasturba Medical College, MangaloreSRM Medical College Hospital and Research Centre, ChennaiMS Ramaiah Medical College, BangaloreJSS Medical College, MysoreHope these will help you to understand which are the top private medical colleges in north India as well as in south India. Thanks & Best Regards, Basiruddin Shaikh
